programme.title: SPIDER-MAN 3
programme.desc: In Spider-Man 3, based on the legendary Marvel Comics series, Peter Parker has finally managed to strike a balance between his devotion to M.J. and his duties as a superhero. But there is a storm brewing on the horizon. When his suit suddenly changes, turning jet-black and enhancing his powers, it transforms Peter as well, bringing out the dark, vengeful side of his personality that he is struggling to control. Under the influence of the suit, Peter becomes overconfident and starts to neglect the people who care about him most. Forced to choose between the seductive power of the new suit and the compassionate hero he used to be, Peter must overcome his personal demons as two of the most-feared villains yet, Sandman and Venom, gather unparalleled power and a thirst for retribution to threaten Peter and everyone he loves.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Dear Kara / New Friends / Date With The Knight - Nico and Morihito were at their classmate Kara Minami's house. Kara had invited them over so they could recover Kara's shredded up letter. Nico tells Kara that in order to use the spell Witch Recovery, the parts of the item need to be somewhat gathered. Since there were other shredded pieces of paper in the pile, it would be difficult for the spell to succeed. The letter that Kara wanted to have Nico recover is a letter from her departed mother that her father had put in the shredder.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Trope-tacular Student Council / A Stray Cats Bubble Of Bliss - Morihito is targeted by the very tropey Student Council. Ibara Ibu, the sexy, older sister Vice President who throws roses. Yuzuru Kenmochi, the other Vice President with a Kansai accent and closed eyes who definitely won't betray you. The European-style tsundere loli and Japanese-style horror cool-dere twin sister secretaries. The treasurer, who looks like an elementary school student, but is a genius hacker. The musclehead beast P.R. Officer. The psychotic knife-licking crazy General Affairs officer, and also in the same office, a mysterious robot-man. Lastly, the one who stand above them all, the Student Council President who won't take his hand off his hat, Tenryu Kiyomiya. What will Morihito do?

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Dogs And Raindrops, Part 1 - Kanshi saves Keigo from getting his sneakers stolen. The person who attacked him used a candy called Drop, which has a stimulant effect that amplifies one's strength and desires. They learn that a person named Wolf was distributing this candy, and the ones using this candy to go berserk are called Dogs. Later, a witch named Nemu Miyao appears before Nico and Morihito.

programme.desc: Silence - Allen comes face to face with Tyki's level 3 Akuma. The Akuma attacks Allen with its dark matter, piercing through his chest.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep69
programme.desc: Invasion - The group escapes with a unstable Allen, but the Akuma catches up with them and Fou decides to sacrifice herself until Allen saves her in time.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep70
programme.desc: God's Clown - Allen's Innocence is reactivated during his battle with the Akuma, and he is given a new long black arm and a white cowl fitted with a mask.

programme.title: My Deer Friend Nokotan S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Girl Meets Deer - Torako Koshi, a former delinquent turned honor student, meets Noko Shikanoko, a horned girl who disrupts her peaceful life.

programme.title: My Deer Friend Nokotan S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Deer Meets Darkness Girl - Koshitan makes herself comfortable in the room of the Deer Club, but her little paradise is quickly destroyed.

programme.title: My Deer Friend Nokotan S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The New Student: Bashame - Koshitan and Nokotan find a mysterious girl named Bashame collapsed at the entrance of the Deer Club.

programme.title: My Deer Friend Nokotan S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Deer Club In The Crosshairs - The Deer Club is filled with eccentric characters, but the members of the student council give them a run for their money.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Curry Is Justice! - Kenichi, nearing 40 and single, is sent to another world. He seeks peace, but chaos follows.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Small House In A Big Forest - Kenichi, nearing 40 and single, is sent to another world. He seeks peace, but chaos follows.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Adventurers (kenichi And His 8 Allies) - Kenichi, nearing 40 and single, is sent to another world. He seeks peace, but chaos follows.

programme.title: Why Raeliana Ended Up At The Duke's Mansion S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Why Raeliana Mada A Contract - Raeliana goes to the duke's mansion to seal a deal with Noah, but he seems unfazed by the trump card she plays.

programme.title: Why Raeliana Ended Up At The Duke's Mansion S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Why Raeliana Trained In Domestic Arts - Raeliana moves to live with Noah to receive domestic arts training, but they find it difficult to pretend to be in love.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Dear Kara / New Friends / Date With The Knight - Nico and Morihito were at their classmate Kara Minami's house. Kara had invited them over so they could recover Kara's shredded up letter. Nico tells Kara that in order to use the spell Witch Recovery, the parts of the item need to be somewhat gathered. Since there were other shredded pieces of paper in the pile, it would be difficult for the spell to succeed. The letter that Kara wanted to have Nico recover is a letter from her departed mother that her father had put in the shredder.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Trope-tacular Student Council / A Stray Cats Bubble Of Bliss - Morihito is targeted by the very tropey Student Council. Ibara Ibu, the sexy, older sister Vice President who throws roses. Yuzuru Kenmochi, the other Vice President with a Kansai accent and closed eyes who definitely won't betray you. The European-style tsundere loli and Japanese-style horror cool-dere twin sister secretaries. The treasurer, who looks like an elementary school student, but is a genius hacker. The musclehead beast P.R. Officer. The psychotic knife-licking crazy General Affairs officer, and also in the same office, a mysterious robot-man. Lastly, the one who stand above them all, the Student Council President who won't take his hand off his hat, Tenryu Kiyomiya. What will Morihito do?

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Dogs And Raindrops, Part 1 - Kanshi saves Keigo from getting his sneakers stolen. The person who attacked him used a candy called Drop, which has a stimulant effect that amplifies one's strength and desires. They learn that a person named Wolf was distributing this candy, and the ones using this candy to go berserk are called Dogs. Later, a witch named Nemu Miyao appears before Nico and Morihito.

programme.title: Kuroko's Basketball 3Rd Season S3 Ep24
programme.desc: It Was You - Akashi realises he can't do this alone and apologises to his team. He unleashes his team's potential with his play.

programme.title: Kuroko's Basketball 3Rd Season S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Again And Again - In the last 40 seconds, the score difference is only 1 point! The champion of the Winter Cup will be decided!

programme.title: Kuroko's Basketball 3Rd Season S3 Ep26
programme.desc: The Greatest Present - After a few weeks from the Winter Cup, Momoi gathers the Generation of Miracles and Kuroko at Teiko Middle School.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Curry Is Justice! - Kenichi, nearing 40 and single, is sent to another world. He seeks peace, but chaos follows.

programme.title: Fruits Basket The Final Season S3 Ep13
programme.desc: See You Again Soon - Tohru, the Somas, and all of their friends prepare for the next chapters of their lives.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S13 Ep30
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S13 Ep32
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.k. S2 Ep2
programme.desc: 6 more disguised celebrities take to the stage, Pearly King, Onomatopoeia, Pig, Sea Slug, Cactus, and Tomato Sauce. Panellists Jonathan Ross, Davina McCall, Peter Crouch and Oti Mabuse try to work out who is behind the mask.

programme.title: The Good Fight S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Reddick, Boseman & Lockhart attempt to adjust to their new landscape as a subsidiary of STR Laurie.

programme.title: The Good Fight S4 Ep3
programme.desc: The DNC head asks Reddick, Boseman & Lockhart for help with a plan to engage African-American voters

programme.title: The Good Fight S4 Ep4
programme.desc: A former divorce client, Duncan Herz, seeks the firm's help.

programme.title: The Good Fight S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Following their secret rendezvous, Liz and Caleb find themselves on a case together.

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery: A Copper's Tale
programme.desc: The gang and their leader, Bruce Reynolds, is greedy for a bigger heist The Glasgow to Euston mail train is said to be carrying a million pounds Reynolds begins his plan to halt the train with false signals at a lonely Buckinghamshire crossing...

programme.title: Cobra Kai S1 Ep1
programme.desc: 34 years after losing the All Valley Karate Championship, Johnny Lawrence decides to reopen the Cobra Kai Dojo while his school adversary, Daniel LaRusso, runs a successful auto business.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Daniel is dismayed to find a new Cobra Kai dojo has been opened up. Johnny learns his dojo has to pass several safety requirements before he can actually start teaching.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Miguel helps Johnny advertise Cobra Kai on the web. Daniel agrees to chaperon at the Halloween dance so he can keep an eye on his daughter.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Robbie is in hot water with his father. Johnny plans to shut down Cobra Kai after Miguel is injured. Samantha and Kyler's relationship hits rock bottom. A vandalized billboard creates tension for Daniel.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cobra Kai gains it's second student. Daniel has an intricate plan to get payback on Johnny. Miguel defends Samantha against Kyler during lunch break.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Johnny's dojo class attracts a group of misfits while his son Robby, who harbors ulterior motives, lands a new job. Samantha makes a new friend in science class. Daniel inspires interest in karate from an unlikely person.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S1 Ep7
programme.desc: When Johnny learns Cobra Kai is banned from the All Valley Tournament, he faces the City Council. Miguel asks Samantha out. Robbie takes lessons from Daniel, just as his buddies plot a heist from LaRusso Auto.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Johnny prepares his Cobra Kai students for the next All Valley Karate Tournament and in turn, he is inspired to clean up his life. Daniel is still unaware of his new pupil's background.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Louie's reckless actions forces Johnny and Daniel to go down memory lane. The Cobra Kai students plot revenge against the popular kids. Miguel grows impatient with Samantha.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S1 Ep10
programme.desc: It is the day of the 2018 All Valley Karate Tournament and Cobra Kai is determined to win. Robbie signs up unaffiliated. A familiar face from the past returns.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep1
programme.desc: In the aftermath of Cobra Kai's win at the Under 18 All Valley Karate Championships, Johnny questions his dojo's philosophy and deals with a figure from his past. Daniel searches for the right way to respond to Cobra Kai's dominance.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep2
programme.desc: When Daniel starts teaching his first karate students, he questions whether he can fill Mr. Miyagi's shoes. Johnny invents some unorthodox training methods with help from an unlikely source.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Daniel pulls out all the stops in an effort to recruit new students to Miyagi Do. Johnny reflects on some of the major relationships in his life - and responds to Daniel's promotional efforts with his own.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Daniel makes another attempt to promote Miyagi Do, and receives guidance in a familiar form. Johnny grows suspicious about Kreese's backstory. A new Cobra Kai student challenges Miguel and befriends Aisha, while Robby revisits a past he'd rather forget.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Daniel struggles to help a new student learn. Miguel makes a new connection, while Johnny tries to repair a relationship. Tensions between the two dojos build to a breaking point.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Daniel's students are given a lesson in overcoming their grudges. Johnny spends some time away from the dojo, while Kreese exerts his influence.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep7
programme.desc: To prepare his students, Daniel gives some new training methods a shot. Miguel puts a new lesson into practice. Johnny makes a tough but pivotal decision that affects Cobra Kai.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Daniel works to make amends with Amanda, while Johnny is introduced to the world of dating apps. Complications arise when Miguel, Samantha, Robby and Tory cross paths.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Johnny cautiously takes a stab at love, while Daniel and Amanda enjoy a romantic date night. An attempt to bring the students of the two dojos together backfires as hostilities between the teens escalate.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep10
programme.desc: It's the first day of school at West Valley High but tensions between the two dojos have not cooled with the end of summer. And the rivalry between Daniel and Johnny comes to a head.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Miguel's fighting for his life, Robby's missing, and Daniel and Johnny's reputations are in tatters as the community reacts to the West Valley brawl.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Daniel and Johnny team up to find Robby. Miguel faces an uncertain future. Kreese tries to bring Tory back to Cobra Kai.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Daniel's tarnished public image takes a toll on his sales, leading to a takeover offer. Johnny tries to raise money for Miguel's surgery.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Following an important meeting in Japan, Daniel revisits Mr. Miyagi's hometown in Okinawa. Johnny attempts to reconnect with Robby.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep5
programme.desc: In Okinawa, Daniel spends time with an old friend - and an old enemy, who has much to teach him. The dueling dojos' rivalry comes to a nasty head.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Miguel helps Johnny craft the perfect social media message. Kreese scouts new recruits while Daniel and Amanda try to shut down Cobra Kai.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Daniel spends some father-daughter time with a traumatized Sam. Johnny plans to form a new karate dojo but struggles to come up with a cool name.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Informed that this year's All Valley Karate Tournament is being canceled, the three competing sensei attend a city council meeting to save it.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep9
programme.desc: It's Christmastime in the Valley, and romance is in the air. Daniel and Miguel find unexpected common ground, and the Cobra Kai recruits go on a mission.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Old wounds begin to heal at a country club Christmas party, but a brutal assault by Kreese's students leads to new betrayals and alliances.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Following an important meeting in Japan, Daniel revisits Mr. Miyagi's hometown in Okinawa. Johnny attempts to reconnect with Robby.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep5
programme.desc: In Okinawa, Daniel spends time with an old friend - and an old enemy, who has much to teach him. The dueling dojos' rivalry comes to a nasty head.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Miguel helps Johnny craft the perfect social media message. Kreese scouts new recruits while Daniel and Amanda try to shut down Cobra Kai.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Daniel spends some father-daughter time with a traumatized Sam. Johnny plans to form a new karate dojo but struggles to come up with a cool name.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Informed that this year's All Valley Karate Tournament is being canceled, the three competing sensei attend a city council meeting to save it.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep9
programme.desc: It's Christmastime in the Valley, and romance is in the air. Daniel and Miguel find unexpected common ground, and the Cobra Kai recruits go on a mission.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Old wounds begin to heal at a country club Christmas party, but a brutal assault by Kreese's students leads to new betrayals and alliances.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S1 Ep1
programme.desc: 34 years after losing the All Valley Karate Championship, Johnny Lawrence decides to reopen the Cobra Kai Dojo while his school adversary, Daniel LaRusso, runs a successful auto business.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Daniel is dismayed to find a new Cobra Kai dojo has been opened up. Johnny learns his dojo has to pass several safety requirements before he can actually start teaching.

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: In 2084, construction worker Douglas Quaid visits Rekall for a virtual Mars vacationbut the procedure unlocks hidden memories, thrusting him into a deadly rebellion and a secret-agent past.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgement Day
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger reprises his career-changing role as the Terminator in this explosive film that was selected as one of AFI's Top Ten Sci-Fi films of all time.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Chris joins his girlfriend Rose for a weekend at her family's estate. At first, their warm welcome seems like awkwardness about their interracial relationshipuntil disturbing truths emerge.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Vengeance
programme.desc: Lukas (Jack Kane), a young farmer whose family is killed by savage raiders in the countryside, sets out on an epic quest for revenge.

programme.title: The 6th Day
programme.desc: In a future where cloning is common, a corporation illegally clones humans. They mistakenly duplicate the wrong man, who now must evade assassination and reclaim his life.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Before Snow White, two queens clash in The Huntsman: Winter's War. Love, betrayal, and war unfold as Huntsman Eric battles evil to save a kingdom from Ravenna's dark reign.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: In Miami Vice, undercover detectives played by Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell navigate danger, crime, and seduction in a gritty, stylish update of the iconic TV series. Also stars Gong Li.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two Miami cops must switch identities to track down a heroin thief and save their department.

programme.title: Tears Of The Sun
programme.desc: In Tears of the Sun, a Navy SEAL team is sent to rescue a doctor in war-torn Nigeria. The mission shifts from extraction to saving refugees as they face brutal rebels while navigating the dangerous jungle.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Chris joins his girlfriend Rose for a weekend at her family's estate. At first, their warm welcome seems like awkwardness about their interracial relationshipuntil disturbing truths emerge.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Robin Hood in Ridley Scott's epic reimaginingfighting corruption and sparking a rebellion that turns a humble outlaw into a timeless symbol of freedom.

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Will and Jake Grimm are travelling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires genuine courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Before Snow White, two queens clash in The Huntsman: Winter's War. Love, betrayal, and war unfold as Huntsman Eric battles evil to save a kingdom from Ravenna's dark reign.

programme.title: The Mummy (2017)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in The Mummy, a thrilling new take on the legend. When an ancient queen awakens in modern times, she unleashes a terrifying force, sparking a battle across continents.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival, meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: The Tailor Of Panama
programme.desc: Tailor Harry Pendel weaves tales as intricate as his suits, but when his fiction is mistaken for fact, it sparks a deadly chain of events threatening his life and loved ones.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: The Mummy (2017)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in The Mummy, a thrilling new take on the legend. When an ancient queen awakens in modern times, she unleashes a terrifying force, sparking a battle across continents.

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx leads an elite FBI team to hunt a terrorist in Saudi Arabia in The Kingdoma tense clash of cultures and justice, directed by Peter Berg and produced by Michael Mann.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Tanzania - Mount Kilimanjaro - Many call it the 'Roof of Africa'. Mount Kilimanjaro is often considered the easiest of the big Seven. But with a 50% success rate, this journey to the summit is not as easy as it looks.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Antarctica - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of Antarctica and its inhabitants, and the challenges faced due to the changing climate.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Building Your Empire - In an unpredictable world our ancient powers must lay down the foundations of their societies to show their strength and protect their people. Who will build their way to glory?

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Series 1, Episode 7 - In Hong Kong, an old WII detention centre is transformed into a gleaming new university, while respecting the old buildings beneath. And in Wisconsin, USA, and old polluting power station is stripped down and re-engineered into a spacious student facility.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Revisit: Queensland - The adventurer returns to meet previous contributors who turned their back on the rat-race. In the wilds of Queensland he revisits the ever-resilient Bette.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: High Voltage Killer - After meeting several electric eel attack victims and hearing stories of people who lost their lives, Cyril is determined to catch the biggest one possible and measure its voltage. The only problem is how to avoid being electrocuted in the process.

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Competition for food becomes fierce as lion numbers rise, a lioness risks her life to feed her five cubs, Xudum's newborn leopard cubs face a deadly threat.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S2 Ep7

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Deadly Jaws - The Congo is one of Africa's wildest rivers and the fish that swim in its waters are even wilder. At 100 lbs, the scary looking goliath tiger fish is certainly one of the world's most fearsome creatures.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is Arabia's most remarkable treasure. It is a land of surprising beauty filled with unexpected natural wonders, home to some of the rarest animals on Earth - the Arabian Leopard, Arabian Oryx, Green and Hawksbill Turtles - and many more creatures including Arabian Fox, Striped Hyena, Whale Sharks and other sea creatures. Oman's landscape is as diverse as the variety of unique creatures that it supports.

programme.desc: Series 3, Episode 6 - Robson is joined by his Grantchester co-star Kacey Ainsworth for a weekend staycation.

programme.title: Kingdom S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Leopard Mutima's relationship with her mother is at breaking point, and as the balance of power in Nsefu tips towards the lions, the hyenas and wild dogs fight to raise their young.

programme.title: Race Across the World S5 Ep8
programme.desc: Series 5, Episode 8 - The four teams are about to embark on the final leg of the race.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Megawave - Nazar in Portugal is the site of the biggest ocean waves ever recorded on Earth. To understand what creates these monsters, we use specialist jet-ski cameras to ride the waves.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Safari CSI - Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spud, Digger, and Tommy - Explore Tasmanian devils' softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Toto, Banksi, and Lucy - Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pig's rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Heat - Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Adapt or perish in the coral streets as higher-than-normal temperatures make autumn cooling (and survival) more difficult. Shack up with a clownfish family and their sea anemone landlord, then see cleaner fish give manta rays a day at the spa.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Get chills as winter descends, slowing down life on the bustling reef. Meander with reef sharks and octopuses, visit a coral oasis atop an old shipwreck, and spot a banded snake eel's talent for identity theft when it disguises itself as a predator.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Baboon Lagoon - Enter the wilds of South Africa to get an intimate look into one of the continent's most misunderstood primates. Like humans, these primates have unique personalities and share strong bonds with their families and friends.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Safari CSI - Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spud, Digger, and Tommy - Explore Tasmanian devils' softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloo's conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Collar Complications - Rejoin the team for some post-rainy-season drama as they search for Ferinha, Fera, and Badalo, whose tracking collars are missing. Meet a new biologist who helps Lizzie recollar the jaguars, adding a high-tech device that will record even more data.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Adapt or perish in the coral streets as higher-than-normal temperatures make autumn cooling (and survival) more difficult. Shack up with a clownfish family and their sea anemone landlord, then see cleaner fish give manta rays a day at the spa.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Get chills as winter descends, slowing down life on the bustling reef. Meander with reef sharks and octopuses, visit a coral oasis atop an old shipwreck, and spot a banded snake eel's talent for identity theft when it disguises itself as a predator.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Baboon Lagoon - Enter the wilds of South Africa to get an intimate look into one of the continent's most misunderstood primates. Like humans, these primates have unique personalities and share strong bonds with their families and friends.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Safari CSI - Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spud, Digger, and Tommy - Explore Tasmanian devils' softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Toto, Banksi, and Lucy - Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pig's rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Heat - Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Adapt or perish in the coral streets as higher-than-normal temperatures make autumn cooling (and survival) more difficult. Shack up with a clownfish family and their sea anemone landlord, then see cleaner fish give manta rays a day at the spa.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Get chills as winter descends, slowing down life on the bustling reef. Meander with reef sharks and octopuses, visit a coral oasis atop an old shipwreck, and spot a banded snake eel's talent for identity theft when it disguises itself as a predator.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Join the rescue team for a madcap chase after a red-tailed hawk. He may be unable to fly, but he sure can run! Then follow the recovery of a rare albino squirrel who can't walk, and see how the medical team ensures he'll be ready for the wild again.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Wines New Friend - Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik's head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia's life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Ghosts of Cederberg - A rocky landscape, carved over eons by wind, water and fire, these are the Cederberg Mountains of South Africa. These imposing peaks are home to an incredible diversity of plants and animals. But there are some here that remain unseen, lurking in the shadows and ready to strike at any time...

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Namib: Land Of Extremes - The Namib Desert is a land of extremes, from icy ocean to baking sand. It takes toughness and adaptation to live in this desert, and only a special few can. From the sidewinding adder to the fog-collecting beetle, each animal has their tricks for survival in the Namib.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Last Desert Giants - The Namib is the oldest desert in the world, hugging Africa's shoreline for over 400 kilometers. It is one of the most inhospitable habitats on earth. Yet the world's largest land mammal has made a home here, adapted through behavior and designed to life in the extreme.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Crowded Islands - On rocky islands off the coast of South Africa, thousands of creatures congregate to breed. Among these, huge colonies of cape gannets dominate. Surrounded by rich waters, they can find enough to feed themselves and their young. But life is full of challenges for the breeding gannets...

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Return to the Wild - The Eastern Cape Province is investing heavily in ecotourism and conservation as an alternative to fishing and commercial development. The region is reclaiming farmlands and closing fishing grounds for wildlife. This is one of the most exciting conservation success stories in Africa.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands With Eoin Warner S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sea of Serpents - Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrake's dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lemurs of Madagascar - The island is the land of Lemurs. Lemurs are fascinating arboreal primitive primates of Madagascar represented in all sizes, colors, and shapes from the largest Indri to the tiny mouse lemur.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wanderers of the Lost Forest - Hogsback, South Africa, is home to two fascinating primates: The Samango monkeys and the Cape Parrots. See how they overcome habit loss, travel across town for food, and make the most of a difficult situation.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Baboons of Bambelela - The Bambelela Troop is a successful and gregarious troop of Chacma Baboons that live in a pristine valley in the Waterberg Mountains of South Africa. But they have a problemthey're not the only baboons around.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Geladas of Ethiopia - The gelada is a rare monkey that lives in the Simien Mountains of Ethiopia. They're charismatic, vocal, and mix affection and confrontation. Watch as they face the challenges of their habitatand each other.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Baboon Lagoon - Enter the wilds of South Africa to get an intimate look into one of the continent's most misunderstood primates. Like humans, these primates have unique personalities and share strong bonds with their families and friends.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Adapt Or Die - Feel the heat when the pride tries to hunt down adequate food as drought conditions push them (and their prey) dangerously close to death. Watch Einstein adapt to solo life, then assess the damage after new mom Kalwezi fights for her cubs' lives.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions' camouflage. Watch Einstein fail to make new connections and weigh the pros and cons when Keeza and her cub are kidnapped by rival male Mad-Eye Moody.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Family Dynamics - Say hello to a season of plenty as flood waters recede and vast herds of prey return to the Chobe's banks. Watch Keeza and her cub make a break for it while Caller and Tom Tom brawl with their enemies, then cheer when Einstein finally finds a mate.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Einstein Rules - Come full circle as the dry season descends and the Waterfront Pride enjoys good hunting and renewed confidence in their territory. Then celebrate the success of former outsider Einstein, who gets down to business as the king of his very own pride.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Queen is Back - Feel the heat as Lizzie and veterinarian Joares scramble to collar more jaguars amid storms, floods, and power outages. Try to pin down the elusive Badalo before his data-gathering tag drops off and meet a new female the team is eager to study.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Badalo is Missing - Watch the Onafari team get to know Aroeira, their newly collared female, and take a peek at Aurora's cub, Apolo. Continue to track Badalo, who has moved deeper into the flooded forest, where he puts Lizzie's game-changing research in jeopardy.

programme.title: In For The Kill
programme.desc: Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Adapt Or Die - Feel the heat when the pride tries to hunt down adequate food as drought conditions push them (and their prey) dangerously close to death. Watch Einstein adapt to solo life, then assess the damage after new mom Kalwezi fights for her cubs' lives.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions' camouflage. Watch Einstein fail to make new connections and weigh the pros and cons when Keeza and her cub are kidnapped by rival male Mad-Eye Moody.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Family Dynamics - Say hello to a season of plenty as flood waters recede and vast herds of prey return to the Chobe's banks. Watch Keeza and her cub make a break for it while Caller and Tom Tom brawl with their enemies, then cheer when Einstein finally finds a mate.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Einstein Rules - Come full circle as the dry season descends and the Waterfront Pride enjoys good hunting and renewed confidence in their territory. Then celebrate the success of former outsider Einstein, who gets down to business as the king of his very own pride.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Queen is Back - Feel the heat as Lizzie and veterinarian Joares scramble to collar more jaguars amid storms, floods, and power outages. Try to pin down the elusive Badalo before his data-gathering tag drops off and meet a new female the team is eager to study.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Badalo is Missing - Watch the Onafari team get to know Aroeira, their newly collared female, and take a peek at Aurora's cub, Apolo. Continue to track Badalo, who has moved deeper into the flooded forest, where he puts Lizzie's game-changing research in jeopardy.

programme.title: In For The Kill
programme.desc: Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Check in with the centre's resident turkey vulture, who's ready for release and in search of a flock. While Nathalie and her team rush to secure funding for a new facility, the medical team is baffled by a toad who has mysteriously taken ill.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Bald is Beautiful - After a terrible accident at the nursery forest school, life changes drastically for nine-month-old Alejandra. And at forest school, the students enjoy a poolside classroom where Valentino proves he's much more than just a class clown.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island - Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island - Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. It's an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Christmas Island - Christmas Island, over a thousand kilometres northwest of Australia's mainland, is a speck of an island that rises out of the Indian Ocean, a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and it's stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fraser Island - Just to the south of the Great Barrier Reef and the Tropic of Capricorn, Fraser Island lies like a sprawling lizard. Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands With Eoin Warner S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Edge of the Abyss - Continue the odyssey along Ireland's west coast. Spy on the love affairs of grey seals in the Inishkea Islands and ply Connemara's turquoise waters. Wander in Clare's magical woods and catch hundreds of basking sharks engaged in a mating display.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands With Eoin Warner S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Echoes of the Past - Learn how Arctic terns negotiate a 50,000-mile-a-year commute to summer in Kerry's Maharee Islands. Go whale-watching off Brandon Head, then witness Ireland's greatest wildlife spectacle: a 1,000-strong colony of grey seals on Great Blasket Island.

programme.title: Coastal Africa S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Golden Forest - This is the story of the Golden Forest, the vast expanses of kelp that lines Africa's southwestern shore. Fed by an upwelling of nutrients from deep in the Atlantic, the kelp forest nurtures four distinct worlds.

programme.title: Coastal Africa S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Algoa Bay: Last Refuge of the African Penguin - The population of African penguins in Southern Africa is on the decline, but the charismatic species has found a stronghold on two islands in Algoa Bay. This is the story of the penguins' daily struggle to raise families in an unforgiving and hostile environment.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Woodland Troop - In this small patch of woodland, two young monkeys face the toughest time of their lives. As they find their place in the world, they must learn which neighbors are allies, and which are foes. Who to trust, and who to avoid. They will suffer loss, and gain friends, as they discover what it means to be part of the Woodland Troop.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Better Together - The wilds of Zambia are a tough place to live. Here, many animals must come together in groups to help defend territory, protect offspring, find food and overcome predators.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Safari CSI - Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Catching Air - Watch beginners make their first leap into the air, like an Andean condor who must attend flight school before spreading its wings. Meet oddballs who soar without feathers and marvel at a peregrine falcon's speed as it dives to catch its prey.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Flight Meals - Go hunting with flyers who excel at making mid-air catches. Watch the metamorphosis of the acrobatic emperor dragonfly, admire the barn owl's stealthy approach to prey, and catch a wandering salamander's death-defying leap into the abyss.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Love in the Air - Check in with animals who are winners at the aerial mating game. Take flight with a bee crafting a custom love potion, watch a draco lizard soar to fend off rivals, and witness the graceful pas de deux that bonds a pair of Japanese cranes for life.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Flight Path - Plot a course for adventure as animals go on remarkable journeys through the skies. Navigate a wooden labyrinth with a speedy goshawk, join a sandgrouse's trek to a distant watering hole, and see a murmuration of starlings mesmerize their nemesis.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ice - Trek to the planet's quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Grasslands - Explore one of Earth's most vital but overlooked habitats and learn how grasslands could slow climate change by soaking up more carbon than forests do. Meet key species, such as bison and pumas, that could restore this resource and heal our planet.

programme.title: After The Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fire's pivotal role in shaping Australia's natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020's brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continent's wildlife.

programme.title: The First Class Travel Show S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Finland and Sweden - Josie Gibson heads to Finland and Sweden, flying Business, with its fully flat reclining seats, before enjoying gourmet food, a campfire, a floating sauna, plus helicopter and speedboat rides.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home S8 Ep5
programme.desc: Weymouth and Chiswick - George helps a couple whose Weymouth home was destroyed overnight by a flash flood, and revisits a couple in Chiswick to find out what's next on their demolition list.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jamie shares more fabulous one-pan dishes: foolproof tray-baked salmon in a bag, super-easy tomato fritters that you can rattle out in a frying pan, and roasted rolled pork and a risotto that are BOTH cooked in the same casserole pan. Result!

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders S1 Ep4
programme.desc: In this episode Jamie takes midweek meals up a notch, knocking out a flavour-packed, simple gnocchi supper and giant spicy meatballs full of delicious time-saving cheats, and turns a family favourite on its head with his upside-down fish pie.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Edinburgh - Tom Kerridge is taking Fred to Edinburgh, a city that's home to one of the UK's most vibrant food scenes. Tom loves places that offer great ingredients, artful cooking and an unfussy atmosphere.

programme.desc: Finland and Sweden - Josie Gibson heads to Finland and Sweden, flying Business, with its fully flat reclining seats, before enjoying gourmet food, a campfire, a floating sauna, plus helicopter and speedboat rides.

programme.desc: Tuscany - There's more to Tuscany than Chianti as Gino reveals a very different side of this much visited region, one that is steeped in medieval heritage and culinary customs.

programme.desc: Perfectly Paired - Rachel explores new ways to pair chocolate with other flavours. She learns the science of tasting chocolate and makes dishes such as chocolate cardamom meringues.

programme.desc: Hong Kong - Josie heads to Hong Kong, flying first class to stay at the Rosewood Hotel where she has her own butler! She also heads out on a luxury yacht to see the region's many islands, and enjoys cocktails.

programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 7 - It's the semi-final. Gordon Ramsay will only invest in someone who can nail a brand and make a splash on social media.

programme.title: Grand Designs S21 Ep5
programme.desc: South Herefordshire 2023 - Furniture maker Lucinda, son Dan and daughter Rosie build a wooden armadillo house in the woodland above their old family home. All for just 150k, without heavy machinery and by inventing ways to transport materials without damaging tree roots.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home S8 Ep5
programme.desc: Weymouth and Chiswick - George helps a couple whose Weymouth home was destroyed overnight by a flash flood, and revisits a couple in Chiswick to find out what's next on their demolition list.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S3 Ep69
programme.desc: Puss In Book - While out fighting off ninja pirates, Puss stumbles on a fairy tale book. When he opens it, the adventure begins, as the viewer must choose each outcome, eventually freeing Puss from the book.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S3 Ep70
programme.desc: The Scarlet Panther - When the feared Scarlet Panther comes to town, Puss is forced to give up his boots and must wear laid-back slippers which change his personality

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Tea Time Trouble - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Benny and The Jests - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S3 Ep70
programme.desc: Squad Goals - When King Juliens consultant tells him that his squad is losing their cool King Julien decides to get a whole new crew

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S3 Ep71
programme.desc: One More Cup, Part 2 - King Julien discovers tea which becomes a huge hit throughout the kingdom but when Karls brother Bruce invites him to his coffee corporation trouble start to brew

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Dollhouse Hotel - When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it's time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! Hotel guests Gabby and Pandy check in with the Hotel Manager DJ Catnip then go to Mercat's Spa and even order room service from Pillow Cat! For our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Pillow Cat sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep20
programme.desc: A Knight's Tail - Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep30
programme.desc: The Coo Chi Coup - Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat,he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread,the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful,but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevin's jokes. Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his comedian's disease. Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Gorgwatch Project - After Thunk and Guy tell Eep and Dawn a campfire story of Gorgwatch, a hideous monster who roams the woods, the girls are terrified. After a sleepless night, Guy and Thunk assure the girls it's just a made up story. Dawn and Eep are relieved until they find proof that Gorgwatch is real... and he's coming for them.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Skate or Dawn - When Guy invents a primitive skateboard, Eep and Dawn have a blast trying new tricks. But when the punch monkeys want to take over the girl's awesome new skate spot, Dawn and the punch monkeys enter a skate-off to win back the skate canyon once and for all.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Phil's Fun Farm - When Phil learns no one on the farm thinks he's fun, he sets out to prove them all wrong... by building a crazy amusement park.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Featherhide - Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young cloaking dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fault Ripper - Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it's revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Uniconned - Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harold's latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep69
programme.desc: The Heat is On - On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict no-babies policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep70
programme.desc: One Tricked Pony - An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits' fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, Bridges Aflame. Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep71
programme.desc: Federal Slumber Party - Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he's applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby's cover at stake, it's up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Rollodons - When tar fills the cracks of the crater, the Dinotrux must find a way to herd the free-roaming Rollodons to help smooth over the sticky situation.

programme.title: Turbo F.a.s.t. S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Groundhog Stay,Gone Guys Gone - Skidmark and White Shadow try to stop spring from coming by keeping a groundhog in his hole, Smoove loses the power behind his effortless cool.

programme.title: Turbo F.a.s.t. S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Party Poopers,The League - The FAST crew's vacation is threatened by hard-partying toilet frogs. The Crew quits racing when they become obsessed with a fantasy racing league.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Australian Blunder Down Under - When a mother kangaroo hops away with Wally's hat on her head and Fritz in her pouch, Wally, Wenda and Odlulu must work together. They use the Talk to Animals Keys to track the runaway kangaroo through the Australian Outback.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Big in Japan - Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep15
programme.desc: The Case Of The Ruined Race - It's the Brickabuild Sports & Fun Day and Clockwork Mouse tells Carlton she doesn't want ANY accidents. But when the Egg & Spoon Race comes to a grinding halt, Noddy has to find out who is trying to ruin the race.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep16
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Investigation Kit - It's the Royal Egg Hunt and Noddy's investigation kit goes missing. With Bumpy and Revs, Noddy soon finds some of his things, but not his binoculars. Someone must be using them, but what for? Noddy needs to find out in time before the Egg Hunt starts.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Nick Solves The Case - PC Pete has been summonsed to get to the bottom of some missing fuel. But where's Nick? And who can solve the case?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Simply The Best - Molecom is very grateful to Plugger for rescuing him after yet another of Flash's pranks. But Plugger is soon frustrated by Molecom's attempts to help Meanwhile, Roary is trying hard to beat his best lap time.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Ladybird Den - Crocky doesnt know where his collection of sticks has gone until Pia realises Raa Raa took them by mistake.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Speedy Racers - Raa Raa and his friends are racing their vehicles through the Jingly Jangly Jungle but who will win

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep20
programme.desc: A Knight's Tail - Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep21
programme.desc: DJ's Glow Ride - Gabby receives a special nighttime delivery, unboxing a glow-in-the-dark train engine. However, she realizes that she's missing the other three train cars to complete the whole train. The Gabby Cats help Gabby build the other three glow-in-the-dark train cars by creating shapes through interactive/musical games. In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, DJ Catnip sings a song.

programme.desc: Bossa Nova - After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp,he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Meanwhile,Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Journey to the Snowcano - Jun struggles to convince Tom to trust her faith in myths over the Book of Dragons when they venture to a place that his book seems to say is extremely dangerous.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep26

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor's coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty's five babies.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty's babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it's too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. She's going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Dollhouse Store Day - When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnip's Music Store!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy's Sleepover - When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. They help her conquer her fears and enjoy her first sleepover.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Let's Make A Movie! - When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it's movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Joy Story - When Eep and Dawn find a stranded egg, they eagerly take it in as their new pet, but when they learn the egg is not what it seems, they have to return it before it becomes dangerous.

programme.desc: Skidmark competes with rich snail Shellsworth to build a railroad, Turbo and Chet roadtrip with their trucker dad and protect their cargo from bandits.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Bahama Drama - When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

programme.title: Morphle S2 Ep2

programme.desc: Storytime - It's storytime! Jeff is excited to read his new book, but he doesn't want to share it with his friends.

programme.title: Minibods S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Party Time Pogo - It's party time with Pogo! He's excited for Jeff's party, but they have very different ideas of what makes a party fun.

programme.title: Minibods S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Teddy Bear Panic - It's a teddy bear panic! Pogo accidentally ruins Newt's teddy bear-shaped hedge & tries to hide it from her.

programme.desc: Jordie's Bed is Alive! - A series of magical items are coming to life across the city, starting with Jordie's bed! Mila & Morphle must also catch a wild magic carpet.

programme.desc: Morphle & Orphle Epic Tag - Morphle & his naughty twin, Orphle, are locked in a city-wide game of tag, morphing into dinosaurs & race cars to outsmart each other.

programme.desc: Up up and Away - It's up, up & away to the Party Planet for balloons! The friends find a mysterious egg & then discover a stowaway frog on the rocket.

programme.title: Rob The Robot S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Team Power - The crew needs team power to find new fuel on the Power Planet, then they celebrate friendship on Cosmic Day.

programme.title: Rob The Robot S1 Ep23
programme.desc: The Big Robowski - Find out who will be The Big Robowski on the Space Ball Planet, then compete for a prize on a TV game show.

programme.desc: Pumpkin Munch Mayhem - It's pumpkin munch mayhem! A hungry Wrigglepillar wants to eat Newt's giant pumpkin & Bubbles cheats in a football game.

programme.title: Minibods S1 Ep7

programme.desc: Pups Save a Hum-ata / Pups Stop the Foggy Skies - Mayor Humdinger's birthday party goes horribly awry when Marshall Kitty gets trapped inside a life-sized piata. / Mayor Humdinger tries pushing fog into Adventure Bay, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find animals missing in the clouds and save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1015
programme.desc: Pups Save a Baby Caribou / Pups Save Luke and His Luke-Alike - When a baby caribou winds up speeding down a mountainside. It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the calf and reunite him with his family. / When Luke Stars gets blown away in a giant tumbleweed, Digi and Tal make a duplicate which dances out of control.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: DORA S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Abuela's Quinceaera / Story Time - Dora finds out that her Abuela never had a quincea?era and throws her a super-secret surprise party with a special dress, tiara, and shoes! Dora's friend Coco doesn't have a story for Story Time, so they go to the Tall Tale Tree in search of one!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep225
programme.desc: Finloose / Operation Ernie - When dancing is outlawed in Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark will do whatever it takes to get the town dancing again! Baby and William try to help Ernie make a best friend.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep226
programme.desc: Saltwater Studios / Sand Crabby - When Baby and his friends are asked to perform at a music festival, they can't decide which genre of song to play. Detective Baby Shark and William Watson solve a crabby mystery.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep610
programme.desc: Flying on Holiday Part 1 - The Pig family are going on vacation. Peppa and George pack their favorite toys and Granny and Grandpa are left to look after Goldie the Fish.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep611
programme.desc: The Holiday House Part 2 - Peppa and her family arrive in Italy. Everyone is talking in a different language and Daddy Pig finds driving on the right a little difficult.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep612
programme.desc: Holiday in the Sun Part 3 - On the first day in their vacation villa, Peppa and her family go exploring in the local village.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep613
programme.desc: End of the Holiday Part 4 - Peppa has enjoyed her very first holiday abroad, but it is now time to go home. She can't wait to see Suzy and Goldie again.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Watch Out For Barbabright / If I Were A Billionaire - The twins visit Barbabright's room. If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep214
programme.desc: The Louvre / Opposite Day - On a trip to Paris, the Barbapapa family will discover the most incredible museum: the Louvre! Barbalala has decided to respect all the rules of the day of opposites.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep212
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Ballpark / The Crew Builds A Surf Bridge - When Rubble's favorite baseball star Aaron Judge can't get out of town to the home run derby, Rubble & Crew build a stadium to hold the derby right in Builder Cove! Surf's up for Rubble & Crew! Well, if they can get over the super hot sand, it is.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep213
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Reuse-It Station / The Crew Builds A Duck Bridge - When Speed Meister builds his own station for reusing trash, the pups have to clean up the mess all over Builder Cove. After a baby duckling follows them home, Rubble & Crew use their construction know-how to bring the duckling back to its home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep508
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1018
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Grandpa and Mr. Alex - When Alex and Mr. Porter swap roles, the pups must help track down the Mini-Patrol after they go missing.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Buttercup / We Need To Save The Corals - Barbidou's beautiful roses mysteriously disappeared during the night. Barbapapa decides to tell the barbababies about the time he went to explore the Arctic and the seabed.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Barbapileup - Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Spaceland / New Rocket / Babysitting - Tim, Tommy and Tia get lost at a play centre. Tim tries to find a new rocket that's perfect for him. Tim tries to bend all the rules when Terri comes to babysit.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep212
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Ballpark / The Crew Builds A Surf Bridge - When Rubble's favorite baseball star Aaron Judge can't get out of town to the home run derby, Rubble & Crew build a stadium to hold the derby right in Builder Cove! Surf's up for Rubble & Crew! Well, if they can get over the super hot sand, it is.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep207
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Charger A Super Bed - Charger has a problem... he's got too much energy to sleep! Lucky for him, Rubble & Crew knows there's always a construction solution.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Partly Claudia / Ranita's Magic Stripes - Dora and Boots take Claudia, an energetic young rain cloud, to rain on a dry water slide. / Boots gets a case of Tickle Tail that Ranita the Frog can cure if she gets her magic stripes by helping friends around the Rainforest.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Princess For A Day / Barbabeau's Adventure - Barbabelle proudly announces to her family that she wants to become a princess. Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Summer Camp I / Summer Camp II - Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thse", a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Boots / Moon Parrot / Tailball - Tim tries out some new rocket boots which soon fly out of control. Tim, Tommy and Tia bird-sit the Bronte's MoonParrot. Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Pups Save a Stinky Flower / Pups Save a Monkey-Naut - Mayor Humdinger drops off a 'gift' to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms. Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1018
programme.desc: Pups Save a Disappearing Flounder - When Cap'n Turbot's ship disappears, the Paw Patrol must venture into the mysterious Adventure Bay Triangle to find the missing vessel.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep122
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm - Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town. Rubble and Motor come up with crafty construction solutions to fix Farmer Zoe's squirrel problem before the Farm Fair.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep615

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep616
