programme.desc: Lights Out - When the lights go out in Home Dome, the Teletubbies get the giggles! The lights come back on again and there's Tubby Custard mess everywhere.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep20
programme.desc: Snow - Dee encourages a friend to say 'snow', and goes on a whirlwind word adventure. They see lots of snow, cold snow, falling snow, twinkly snow and yummy snow.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Phoebe's Hotel - As it's rainy, Phoebe decides to play hotel - will the game go as well as she hopes?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Messy Migration - When a little turtle gets stranded on the beach in OKIDO, Messy helps her rejoin her friends so they can begin their journey across the ocean.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep42
programme.desc: Show and Tell - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep41
programme.desc: Stickbird - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep15
programme.desc: The Love Badge - When Duggee gets a card from someone he loves, the Squirrels ask: does he still love them? In a show-stopping song, Delivery Chipmunk shows them the answer is a resounding YES.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep14
programme.desc: The Shopping Badge - Duggee loves to shop local, so the Big Shop is a Big Deal for him. He's over-excited and wants two of everything. The Squirrels have to remind him 'we only popped in for milk!'

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cool, Man - At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Eiffel Tower, France - Four adventure-seeking superheroes explore places all around the world. The Go Jetters try to fix the Eiffel tower after Grandmaster Glitch breaks it while using it as a TV aerial.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Bin Night - Bluey, Bingo and Dad always take out the bins. Over a few weeks, Bingo tells Dad about a new kid at kindy who is mean to her and Mum offers some good advice.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Andy and the Tiger Cubs - Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Bandhavgarh tiger reserve in India on a baby animal mission to track down a female tiger and her new born cubs. Along the way, our team outwit a sloth that strays dangerously close to the den where the cubs are resting.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Bus Ride - Disability assistance dog Tinks needs all her super-fetch skills and big dog energy as she helps Charli catch a bus to meet her friend Lydia, who is getting married.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Sea Anemone and Pitcher Plant - Steve and Aneeshwar meet a sea anemone to see how it feeds underwater. Next, they meet a pitcher plant and discover the extraordinary wild connection they share.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep12
programme.desc: Smart Parrot - Captain Captain, Sandy and Seaweed get a new 'Smart Parrot' to help make life easier around the Scarlet Squid. Unfortunately it only ends up making life harder for the pirates!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep2
programme.desc: The Duck Badge - The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep1
programme.desc: The Tooth Brushing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep52
programme.desc: The Glasses Badge - When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help make his dreams come true?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep21
programme.desc: The Salmon Run, Alaska - Alaska's a cool place to watch the salmon run, but Glitch opens a 'fishy taxi service' to help the salmon avoid tricky waterfalls and greedy bears. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Go Jetters Academy: Ghost Crabs - Glitch takes all the sand from the Academy beach, leaving the local crabs with nowhere to hide from hungry seagulls. Can the Go Jetters repair the beach before it's too late?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep23
programme.desc: Thomas and the Royal Engine - An invitation from the Queen sends Thomas and the crew to London as they weave through delays and debacles while racing to a royal celebration.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Sophie Can Do - Stanley asks Sophie to help out with a few of his jobs whilst she waits for her dino costume to dry. The pair go about town fixing everyone's problems in fun and imaginative ways.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Can-Bots - Stanley is very busy, so he invents three little robots called the Can Bots to help. They begin well but soon start getting out of hand. Stanley has some reprogramming to do.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Bold Knight - When Stan is too scared to go into the cellar, Monty wonders if even adults get scared.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep17
programme.desc: It's time to go to the hairdressers - JoJo learns how fun the hairdresser's can be when she goes with Gran Gran for a trim. After helping the hairdresser, JoJo also gets her own new style ready for Ezra's party!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Musical Statues - At the end of a long day, Bluey and her family are out of sync and out of sorts, so Mum gets everyone to play musical statues.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Stories - Indy thinks she's no good because her model horse looks like a cow, but Calypso encourages her not to give up, so she tries to fix it with a little help from Winton.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Puppets - Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go awry when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.desc: The Get Indoors Badge - A weather warning from Duggee's barometer leads the Squirrels to round up the creatures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Camouflage Badge - The Squirrels meet a chameleon called Cosey and learn about blending into surroundings.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Squirrel Babies - Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Eiffel Tower, France - Four adventure-seeking superheroes explore places all around the world. The Go Jetters try to fix the Eiffel tower after Grandmaster Glitch breaks it while using it as a TV aerial.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Parsley - Live from the Roots and Fruits Theatre, Parsley sings a rock song.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Pepper - Pepper performs a bell ringing act.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Evil Pea's Big Freeze - Evil Pea freezes the veggies so she can take over the whole supermarket. Chilli's heat unfreezes Supertato who then races on lolly-stick skis to thwart Evil Pea and save the day.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Cheese Moon - It's a space race as Supertato helps Carrot fly her baguette rocket to be the first Veggie on the Cheese Moon but half way there Evil Pea crashes into them making them crash land.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep100
programme.desc: Lights Out - When the lights go out in Home Dome, the Teletubbies get the giggles! The lights come back on again and there's Tubby Custard mess everywhere.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep20
programme.desc: Snow - Dee encourages a friend to say 'snow', and goes on a whirlwind word adventure. They see lots of snow, cold snow, falling snow, twinkly snow and yummy snow.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Phoebe's Hotel - As it's rainy, Phoebe decides to play hotel - will the game go as well as she hopes?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Messy Migration - When a little turtle gets stranded on the beach in OKIDO, Messy helps her rejoin her friends so they can begin their journey across the ocean.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep42
programme.desc: Show and Tell - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep41
programme.desc: Stickbird - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep15
programme.desc: The Love Badge - When Duggee gets a card from someone he loves, the Squirrels ask: does he still love them? In a show-stopping song, Delivery Chipmunk shows them the answer is a resounding YES.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep14
programme.desc: The Shopping Badge - Duggee loves to shop local, so the Big Shop is a Big Deal for him. He's over-excited and wants two of everything. The Squirrels have to remind him 'we only popped in for milk!'

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cool, Man - At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Eiffel Tower, France - Four adventure-seeking superheroes explore places all around the world. The Go Jetters try to fix the Eiffel tower after Grandmaster Glitch breaks it while using it as a TV aerial.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Bin Night - Bluey, Bingo and Dad always take out the bins. Over a few weeks, Bingo tells Dad about a new kid at kindy who is mean to her and Mum offers some good advice.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Andy and the Tiger Cubs - Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Bandhavgarh tiger reserve in India on a baby animal mission to track down a female tiger and her new born cubs. Along the way, our team outwit a sloth that strays dangerously close to the den where the cubs are resting.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Bus Ride - Disability assistance dog Tinks needs all her super-fetch skills and big dog energy as she helps Charli catch a bus to meet her friend Lydia, who is getting married.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Sea Anemone and Pitcher Plant - Steve and Aneeshwar meet a sea anemone to see how it feeds underwater. Next, they meet a pitcher plant and discover the extraordinary wild connection they share.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep12
programme.desc: Smart Parrot - Captain Captain, Sandy and Seaweed get a new 'Smart Parrot' to help make life easier around the Scarlet Squid. Unfortunately it only ends up making life harder for the pirates!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep2
programme.desc: The Duck Badge - The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep1
programme.desc: The Tooth Brushing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep52
programme.desc: The Glasses Badge - When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help make his dreams come true?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep21
programme.desc: The Salmon Run, Alaska - Alaska's a cool place to watch the salmon run, but Glitch opens a 'fishy taxi service' to help the salmon avoid tricky waterfalls and greedy bears. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Go Jetters Academy: Ghost Crabs - Glitch takes all the sand from the Academy beach, leaving the local crabs with nowhere to hide from hungry seagulls. Can the Go Jetters repair the beach before it's too late?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep23
programme.desc: Thomas and the Royal Engine - An invitation from the Queen sends Thomas and the crew to London as they weave through delays and debacles while racing to a royal celebration.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Sophie Can Do - Stanley asks Sophie to help out with a few of his jobs whilst she waits for her dino costume to dry. The pair go about town fixing everyone's problems in fun and imaginative ways.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: Racing after a heart transplant - After suffering two sudden cardiac deaths and a number of severe health complications, 32-year-old Tamara Schwabs life was saved by a heart transplant . Shes now vowed not to waste a single minute of her second stint at life and is pushing herself to the limit to compete in the World Transplant Games. But can her body take it?

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Power of Secret Service - Intelligence agencies are influencing governments and spying on countries with no regard for the law. And they are able to remain nearly invisible, in the process. Are they the new superpowers? The last time intelligence agencies commanded as much power as they do today was during the Cold War. Technological innovations mean that more sophisticated warfare is now a reality. It is not just about Russia and the USA anymore. We may be entering a new era of unrest. The U.S. has lost more spies and informants since 2010 than at any other time since the Cold War. Leaders of German intelligence agencies also acknowledge that they have once again fallen upon tough times. Money, data and access are proving to be major factors in determining who actually wields power. The 2016 U.S. election made this clear: U.S. intelligence agencies are certain that Russian intelligence helped elect Donald Trump. But the U.S. has lost old spheres of influence and allies are increasingly pursuing their own agendas. Can President Biden make his country a force for order in the world, again? And what does that mean for political hot spots and potential conflicts with China, Iran, and Russia? And for allies like Saudi Arabia and Turkey? Will Western intelligence agencies regain the power they once exerted? Wars fought with drone and hacker attacks, increasingly delegated power, and surveillance could push these conflicts to their tipping point.

programme.desc: News

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1805
programme.desc: Best of Madison Square Garden - New York Citys Madison Square Garden has hosted some of the best fights in UFC history. On this episode of UFC Unleashed, weve got a collection of bouts coming from the Mecca of combat sports. Featuring Zhang Weili, Georges St-Pierre, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC304EdwardsvsMuhammad2
programme.desc: At UFC 304 in Manchester, England, UFC Welterweight champion Leon "Rocky" Edwards defends his title against Belal "Remember the Name" Muhammad in a highly anticipated rematch.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC317TopuriavsOliveira
programme.desc: UFC International Fight Week 2025 concludes with a stacked card that features a highly anticipated bout between Brazilian superstar Charles Oliveira and undefeated former featherweight king Ilia Topuria for the vacant Lightweight crown. Plus Ajexandre Pantoja defends his flyweight belt against Kai Kara-France and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep1
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep4
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1003MorenovsFigueiredo3
programme.desc: UFC 270 featured the third meeting between flyweight rivals Deiveson Figueiredo and Mexican champion Brandon Moreno. Relive their incredible battle like youve never seen it with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC317TopuriavsOliveira
programme.desc: UFC International Fight Week 2025 concludes with a stacked card that features a highly anticipated bout between Brazilian superstar Charles Oliveira and undefeated former featherweight king Ilia Topuria for the vacant Lightweight crown. Plus Ajexandre Pantoja defends his flyweight belt against Kai Kara-France and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Ep1002
programme.desc: Ultimate Knockouts "Welterweights - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you a collection of the best welterweight KOs.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC321AspinallvsGane
programme.desc: UFC 321 Countdown takes an inside look at the promotions return to Abu Dhabi, where heavyweight king Tom Aspinall battles former interim champion Ciryl Gane. Plus, Virna Jandiroba takes on Mackenzie Dern for the vacant strawweight title.

programme.title: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA
programme.desc: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA - More than a title-winning machine, Pep Guardiola changed the face of football. Trace the evolution of his famed tiki-taka style of play that propelled the likes of Messi, Xavi, Iniesta and Busquets to footballing royalty.

programme.title: UFC 322: Della Maddalena vs. Makhachev
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC superstars will dare to be great at New York Citys Madison Square Garden on November 16, as VeChain UFC 322 presents a championship doubleheader for the ages. In the main event, longtime lightweight champion Islam Makhachev makes his highly anticipated move to 170 pounds to challenge for Jack Della Maddalenas welterweight title. Plus, Chinas Zhang Weili has proven to be perhaps the greatest strawweight of all-time, but this November, she will face the sports greatest flyweight, Valentina Shevchenko, for the 125-pound crown in a long-awaited Super Fight
